Text: Sorry for being stupid, which file do you start the installation with?  Please

Installation
- - - - - - - -
1. Install WinRar (if you don't have it already)

2. Extract the following zip files...
> fo-ss07a.zip
> fo-ss07b.zip
> fo-ss07c.zip
> fo-ss07d.zip
This will open into a sequence multipart rar archive. 

3. Now simply extract the fo-ss07.rar which will yield fo-ss07.exe

Hope this helps!
~Ax

I got it installed alright but it wont start.
Anyone else got the same problem?
